user_question: What are the official rules for beach volleyball and generate an image of a beach volleyball match?
final_answer: Official beach volleyball rules include: 2 players per team, matches played to best of 3 sets, each set to 21 points (15 in the third set), no open-hand tips, and players switch sides every 7 points. Image of a beach volleyball match generated. The dimensions of a beach volleyball court are 16 meters long and 8 meters wide.
